title: Hashtags & Mentions
problem: Content discovery and user connection require hashtags for topic grouping and @mentions for user references. These features enable organic content organization and social interaction.
success_metrics: Clicking hashtag navigates to hashtag page showing all posts
@mentions are clickable and link to user profiles

items.title: Hashtag Parsing & Linking
items.description: Parse post content to identify and link hashtags automatically.
acceptance_criteria: Clickable hashtag links in post content
Support for hashtags with underscores and numbers

items.title: Hashtag Page
items.description: Create the hashtag page showing all posts containing a specific hashtag.
acceptance_criteria: Page header with #hashtag and post count

items.title: Mention Parsing & Linking
items.description: Parse post content to identify and link @mentions to user profiles.
acceptance_criteria: Clickable mention links to user profiles
Support for usernames with dots and underscores

items.title: Trending Hashtags
items.description: Display trending hashtags in the Explore page sidebar.
acceptance_criteria: Calculate trending based on recent usage
Click to navigate to hashtag page
View all link to full list

items.title: Hashtag Input Suggestions
items.description: Show hashtag suggestions when user types # in post input.
acceptance_criteria: Detect # character in create post textarea
